summary: All three requirements (REQ-22, REQ-23, REQ-24) are fully implemented. The backend adds comprehensive analytics query methods with admin/staff authorization. The frontend creates new React Query hooks following existing patterns and expands StaffAnalyticsPanel with all requested metrics in visually distinct card sections. All acceptance criteria are met.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle state migration between deployments
hallucinated_features.reason: This migration infrastructure was not requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest focused solely on adding analytics metrics, frontend display components, and React Query hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Active users calculation and top users leaderboard display in StaffAnalyticsPanel
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specified total hashtags, average videos per user, top 5 hashtags, and recent user activity (last 10 profiles). It did not request active users (last 7 days) metric or a top 5 most active users leaderboard.
